features: 【Metal Mechanical Pencil】The smooth barrel of the mechanical writing pencil has a comfortable feel, and the metal body provides the ideal weight balance for more efficient and fatigue-free writing and drawing.
【No Slip & Easy to Use】The lead mechanical pencil comes with a metal clip and a polygonal barrel to avoid slipping on the desktop. This pencil is easy to use, anyone can easily load and advance lead.
【480PCS Resin Lead】8 tubes of 60pcs super capacity leads. A more durable resin lead which doesn’t require sharpening and is not easy to break, provides ultra-smooth writing and clear dark lines.

【Professional Writing Tools】High-quality metal mechanical pencils are ideal for artists, professionals, teachers and students. If you have any questions, please contact us in time, we will give you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Your Creative Partner 2 Innovation in Every Line
Previous page Next page 1 Quality Graphite 2 Efficient Erasing

How are these mechanical pencils? These mechanical pencils are a testament to craftsmanship and precision. Their 16-sided, non-rolling design, sturdy metal body, and brass 3-claw clutch ensure a secure grip, providing an enjoyable and reliable writing experience. The actual user experience？ Excellent! They protect the lead with a shock-absorbing mechanism and ensure optimal lead exposure with sliding lead sleeve. The Metal Weighted Spring offers a low center of gravity, resulting in a comfortable, precise, and stable writing experience. What about the lead？ The high-polymer lead with high graphite concentration, ensures a rich, dark color and excels in toughness due to enhanced uniformity and reduced impurities. Fine particles reduce friction, ensuring an effortless glide for superior writing. Is it portable and practical for storage? The retractable nib is a great feature for safe pocket storage while protecting the tip. These mechanical pencils also have a handy metal clip, and a shockproof case for convenient storage. Is it a good choice for a gift? Absolutely! An excellent gift choice, combining practicality with creativity. Ideal for various tasks like writing, sketch, drafting, or engineering, this versatile set is sure to be warmly received due to its significant utility. A thoughtful gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit hesitant to get these at first as they seemed uncomfortable from the pictures and I am very picky when it comes to my led pencils but they are amazing. They are extremely comfortable and well built. For the price you can’t beat them as they come with tons of led erasers and many pencils. Overall they are my new favorite pencils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great product.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the quality of these pencils. They are very comfortable. My main concern was whether the lead would easily break, as in most mechanical pencils, but that is not the case with these. Included it 8 boxes of lead, erasers for the pencil itself, and then other large erasers as well. This is great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pen, hand slides when sweaty.
reviews.reviewText: The pen and the set of erasers is perfect, and suits my needs well. The pencil has a nice heft to it and for sure is solid metal and not just plated plastic or some lighter metallic material. The erasers included as well are of good quality, and even self cleaning to an extent. I have yet to see graphite stick to the surface and need to be scrapped off by more than lightly running my thumb along the top. The packaging as well is slick and considerate, with a little self-care message included with the purchase that helps if this is also your first quality pencil purchase.My one gripe is that the material is rather slippery compared to what I am used to, and after writing for an extended period of time any amount of sweat will cause your hand to slip a little bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality - Writes Well - Crap Eraser
reviews.reviewText: I got these because I wanted a mechanical pencil that was more “professional” looking. These are definitely very sleek and write well. I really like the lead that it provided with the pack. The big stand alone erasers are also of great quality. The only negative is the erasers on the pencil itself. They are very flimsy and don’t do a great job of actually erasing things. I primarily just make sure to have the bigger eraser nearby and don’t use the one on the pencil because of this. It seems this is something that most of these types of mechanical pencils have in common though :/Overall, a really great pencil that is very aesthetically appealing and of great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Pencil Set
reviews.reviewText: My expectations weren't high when I saw this pencil set. The price seemed to good to be true. However I was pleasantly surprised.The pencils are nicely weighted that's always an important factor so it was perfect for me. The addition of refills was also a plus.The quality was great at an affordable price. Overall it was a 5 star purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Nice pencils, looks good, feels good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable to hold, great value
reviews.reviewText: I much prefer mechanical pencils over the ones you have to sharpen, so when I saw these I just had to try them. They are comfortable to hold, but have more weight to them than the cheap plastic mechanical pencil I had been using. They are easy to load, and will take up to three leads at a time, making it more time in between refills. In addition to the four pencils there are large erasers, erasers for the pencil lead, and several boxes of lead. This box will keep me writing happily for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Constant broken lead
reviews.reviewText: Pencils are ok, but the included lead breaks constantly. One piece of lead *might* make it through jotting a ten word note.

Very good metal mechanical pencils.Easy to grip with a multifaceted body.16 sided tube design.Retractable Lead guide design.8 packs of #2 hardness resin lead graphite sticks. They are double stacked in the case so you only see 4 in the pics.A tube of replacement erasers that fit the pencils.3 large erasers that really work well (See Pics for a single rub through heavy scribble result.)Great value for a top quality set of durable mechanical pencils.

reviews.reviewTitle: so far so good for the quality
reviews.reviewText: very easy to use and good quality

reviews.reviewText: The quality was very good and very good for the price. I gave one of them to one of my classmates to borrow but they still didin’t gave it back but it’s alr I will keep waiting 😭👍
Use everyday. Break easily if too much lead out, but otherwise great.
